messages.message:
Hi Team, I am working on vulnerabilities, when I run `make clean build-docker` I am getting below error for core-services ( control-plane, file-service, job-service ) .
Release version : 24.07
CS : https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/mkvulnfix
```INFO: Build completed successfully, 1 total action
INFO: Running command line: bazel-bin/external/io_bazel_rules_go/go/tools/go_bin_runner/bin/go version
Loading: 0 packages loaded
Loading: 0 packages loaded
ERROR: Config value 'crafting-dev' is not defined in any .rc file
make: *** [Makefile:428: bazel-build-linux] Error 2```
Maybe a bad backport? Try cherry-picking the entire `instabase/.bazelrc` back to 24.07 to see if it helps
Or at least the crafting-dev line from that file

After adding below lines in .bazelrc I am able to build
```# Remote cache (for crafting sandboxes)
test:crafting-dev --remote_cache=http://localhost:9190
build:crafting-dev --remote_cache=http://localhost:9190```
